mapper.sql: id, pid, name, description, sort, version, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user
mapper.select: select id AS id, pid as "pId", name as name, (case when (pid = 0 or pid is null) then 'true' else 'false' end) as "open" from sys_role

SELECT r.id,r.pid,r.name,r.description,r.sort,r.version,r.create_time,r.update_time,r.create_user,r.update_user, (SELECT name FROM sys_role sr WHERE r.pid = sr.id) AS pName FROM sys_role r
name like CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
order by create_time desc
